ygData.subject: Vampiric Embrace Fixed
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of you who, for some odd reason or another, haven t logged in after last night s patch (May 04th), Vampiric Embrace has been modified , finally.  If
ygData.messageBody:
For those of you who, for some odd reason or another, haven't logged in
after last night's patch (May 04th), Vampiric Embrace has been "modified",
finally. If you haven't got the patch yet, you'll get a new EverQuest
Executuable and one other file.. and possibly the new manual.

When you get the next update, which will be tonight, the changes to the
Vampiric Embrace will be listed in the manual*.* file. All I know at this
point is it says:

===
"9) Vampiric Embrace has been modified from it's original design to
improve game play.

...

Tomorrow night, a revised version of the EverQuest Manual will be
patched. The revision will include a new section which outlines the spells
and skills that have been modified from their original design to enhance
game play."
===

That's 9 of 10 things fixed/changed. Anyhoo, thought I'd give you folks
a note about it. Time for me to go play. :-)

~Myskyra / Tunare

Hoping the change has been worth it.
